channel.title: Back to RS P-Servs, Need some info!
channel.description:
Alright, I'm back (again), but this time I actually have an idea and am willing to work on it :P
So basically, I have a few questions about everything:
[u]Server[/u] What are some good 317 and 508 bases? Which has most of the God items in them? Which is easier to program on? Which bases are pretty much just the base server with no extras on each?
[u]Client[/u] What are the clients available for 317 and 508? Is Silab's client 317, 508, or both? Which is the most easily customizable (both 317 and 508s, please)?
Thanks in advance for those who reply! :)

item.title: Back to RS P-Servs, Need some info!

@jurm wrote:

Thanks

item.title: Back to RS P-Servs, Need some info!
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

jurm:

Oh that does help! Thanks! Know of any blank-ish 508s?

Well, the first 508’s to come out where blank, but completly blank, eg the trade system was never to be seen… And even now there trying to fix them! So, most of the 508’s are blank, ill see if i can get a link for some good ones :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 28, 2009, 10:59:39 am[/size][hr]here we go, a blank (ish) 508 HD Full screen client…

http://www.rune-server.org/showthread.php?t=104529

Also, just go to

http://www.rune-server.org/forumdisplay.php?f=413

For LOADS of clients

Read full topic

item.title: Back to RS P-Servs, Need some info!
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

Well, there are some REALLY good stable 317 sources (blank), theres on called U-Rune-Server, this is based from a project Czar, but improved MASSIVELY! Only one problem ive had with it, i couldn’t add shops, but if you after a bit of a challenge, then download it

here

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,370469.0.html

It’s the WHOLE archive, meaning it has all previous installments of it,

Also, a good client to start on would be one of Galkons

Hope this helps!
~Johno

Read full topic
item.source: Back to RS P-Servs, Need some info!

item.title: Back to RS P-Servs, Need some info!
item.dc:creator: @jurm jurm
item.description:
@jurm wrote:

Thanks for the reply

I’m not really a new coder, just coming back to Private servers as there is nothing left to do for me atm

Read full topic
item.source: Back to RS P-Servs, Need some info!

item.title: Back to RS P-Servs, Need some info!
item.dc:creator: @vic_08 Vic_
item.description:
@vic_08 wrote:

If you’re a new coder (or comming back from a long-absence), go with 317-377. Easiest to code, + stable. Clients are easy to follow and understand too. 503+ is more complicating, plus you have to know how to code instead of just stealing everyone elses codes like the people who code 317’s do ;).

Read full topic
